data.name: Invasion Zero
data.detailed_description:
Invasion Zero is a multi-player online free to play first-shooter game supporting up-to 8 players on a single session where you are able to play against enemy AI bots or players from all over the world.
As the main player, you are equipped with a machine gun, shotgun, or sniper rifle depending on your class with a gun and a knife and a hand grenade.
Your main objective is to survive the battle as much as possible while destroying the spawning enemy forces.

The game contains several playable modes such as:
1- Team Deathmatch (TDM)
2- Free-for-all (FFA)
3- Capture The Flag (CTF)
4- Gun Race (GR)
5- Domination / Cover Point (CP)
6- Search and Destroy (SND)

The graphics of this game are optimized for PC and can be configured in the main menu settings or gameplay settings menu.
The game contains violence and blood.

The game contains violence through ranged and melee weaponry piercing through the body of the enemy players.

data.short_description: Invasion Zero is a multi-player online free to play first-shooter game where you are able to play against enemy AI bots or players from all over the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3400 or higher.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 358 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770k or higher.
  • Memory: 4089 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 358 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3400 or higher.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770k or higher.
  • Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Invasion Zero is a free to play multi-player first-person shooter game including many modes such as Team Deathmatch, Capture the flag, Free-for-all etc..
